# BDAD HW4

```scala
scala> sc.textFile("loudacre/devstatus/devicestatus.txt").map(line => line.split(line.charAt(19))).filter(items => items.length == 14).map(items => Array(items(0), items(1), items(2), items(12), items(13))).map(items => Array(items(0), items(1).split("\\s+")(0), items(2), items(3), items(4))).map(items => items.mkString(",")).saveAsTextFile("loudacre/devstatus/devicestatus_etl")

scala> sc.textFile("loudacre/devstatus/devicestatus_etl").take(10).foreach(println)
```
